        public void setRGBNoConversion(int x,
                      int y,
                      int cx,
                      int cy,
                      int[] data,
                      int offset,
                      int w)
        Apply a given array of colour values to an area of pixels in the image, do not convert for colour model
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate for left of area to set
        y - y-coordinate for top of area to set
        cx - width of area to set
        cy - height of area to set
        data - array of pixel colour values to apply to area
        offset - offset to pixel data in data
        w - width of a line in data (measured in pixels)
